original_title: หนูกันภัย ศึกมหายันต์ ยิงกันสนั่นจอ
overview: The movie is about the life of Ajarn Noo the master of yantra tattooing. He first started to study about magic spells and yantra tattooing at the age of six. His name became renowned as many people tried to test the efficiency of his ability even though he tried to avoid them. The movie shows the way he dealt with his life until he can became who he is today.
title: Noo Gunpai Scroll Master All Hell Breaks Loose
